風.definition: wind; news; style; custom; manner; CL:陣|阵[zhen4],絲|丝[si1]

風中之燭.definition: lit. candle in the wind (idiom); fig. (of sb's life) feeble; hanging on a thread

風中燭，瓦上霜.pinyin: feng1 zhong1 zhu2 , wa3 shang4 shuang1
風中燭，瓦上霜.definition: lit. like a candle in the wind, or frost on the roof (idiom); fig. (of sb's life) feeble; hanging on a thread

風乾.definition: to air-dry; to season (timber etc); air-dried; air-drying

風光.definition: scene; view; sight; landscape; to be well-regarded; to be well-off; grand (dialect); impressive (dialect)

風化.definition: decency; public morals; to weather (rocks); wind erosion

風化區.definition: see 紅燈區|红灯区[hong2 deng1 qu1]

風口.definition: air vent; drafty place; wind gap (geology); tuyere (furnace air nozzle); (fig.) hot trend; fad

風口浪尖.definition: where the wind and the waves are the fiercest; at the heart of the struggle

風向.definition: wind direction; the way the wind is blowing; fig. trends (esp. unpredictable ones); how things are developing; course of events

風向標.definition: vane; propellor blade; weather vane; windsock

風吹日曬.definition: (idiom) to be exposed to the elements

風吹草動.definition: lit. grass stirring in the wind (idiom); fig. the slightest whiff of trouble

風吹雨打.definition: lit. windswept and battered by rain; to undergo hardship (idiom)

風和日麗.definition: moderate wind, beautiful sun (idiom); fine sunny weather, esp. in springtime

風圈.definition: ring around the moon; lunar halo; solar halo

風土.definition: natural conditions and social customs of a place; local conditions

風城.definition: the Windy City, nickname for Chicago 芝加哥[Zhi1jia1ge1], Wellington, New Zealand 惠靈頓|惠灵顿[Hui4ling2dun4] and Hsinchu, Taiwan 新竹[Xin1zhu2]

風塵.definition: windblown dust; hardships of travel; vicissitudes of life; prostitution

風塵僕僕.definition: lit. covered in dust (idiom); fig. travel-worn

風姿.definition: good looks; good figure; graceful bearing; charm

風寒.definition: wind chill; cold weather; common cold (medicine)

風尚.definition: current custom; current way of doing things

風平浪靜.definition: lit. breeze is still, waves are quiet (idiom); tranquil environment; all is quiet; a dead calm (at sea)

風度.definition: elegance (for men); elegant demeanor; grace; poise

風恬浪靜.definition: lit. breeze is still, waves are quiet (idiom); tranquil environment; All is quiet.; a dead calm (at sea)

風情.definition: mien; bearing; grace; amorous feelings; flirtatious expressions; local conditions and customs; wind force, direction etc

風投.definition: venture capital investment (abbr. for 風險投資|风险投资[feng1 xian3 tou2 zi1])

風控.definition: risk control (abbr. for 風險控制|风险控制[feng1 xian3 kong4 zhi4])

風景線.definition: a strip of scenic beauty (coast, river, road etc); (fig.) an eye-catching feature

風暴.definition: storm; violent commotion; fig. crisis (e.g. revolution, uprising, financial crisis etc)

風月.definition: romance; beautiful scenery; small or petty (of talk etc)

風標.definition: wind vane; anemometer; weathercock; fig. person who switches allegiance readily; turncoat

風水先生.definition: feng shui master; geomancer; stock figure in folk tales, as a wise adviser or a charlatan

風水輪流.definition: see 風水輪流轉|风水轮流转[feng1shui3 lun2liu2 zhuan4]

風水輪流轉.definition: fortunes rise and fall; times change

風油精.definition: essential balm containing menthol, eucalyptus oil etc, used as a mosquito repellant

風波.definition: disturbance; crisis; disputes; restlessness; CL:場|场[chang2]

風波不斷.definition: constantly in turmoil; crisis after crisis

風流.definition: distinguished and accomplished; outstanding; talented in letters and unconventional in lifestyle; romantic; dissolute; loose

風流債.definition: lit. love debt; fig. moral obligation in consequence of a love affair; karmic consequences of a love affair

風流雲散.definition: lit. dispersed by wind and scattered like clouds (idiom); fig. scattered far and wide (of friends and relatives)

風流韻事.definition: poetic and passionate (idiom); romance; love affair

風浪.definition: wind and waves; rough waters; (fig.) hardship

風潮.definition: tempest; wave (of popular sentiment etc); craze or fad

風濕性關節炎.pinyin: feng1 shi1 xing4 guan1 jie2 yan2

風火輪.definition: (martial arts) wind-and-fire wheel, weapon used in hand-to-hand fighting; (Daoism) a magical pair of wheels on which one can stand to ride at great speed, used by Nezha 哪吒[Ne2 zha5]; (fig.) never-ending treadmill

風燭殘年.definition: one's late days; to have one foot in the grave

風生水起.definition: lit. a breeze springs up and creates waves on the water (idiom); fig. flourishing; thriving; prosperous

風痱.definition: (TCM) hemiplegia due to an apoplectic stroke

風箏.definition: kite (Etymology: Kites with bamboo whistles attached produced musical sounds when flown.)

風紀.definition: standard of behavior; moral standards; discipline

風聞.definition: to learn sth through hearsay; to get wind of sth

風聲.definition: sound of the wind; rumor; talk; news; reputation

風聲鶴唳.definition: lit. wind sighing and crane calling (idiom); fig. to panic at the slightest move; to be jittery

風花雪月.definition: wind, flower, snow and moon, trite poetry subject (idiom); effete language without substance; love affair; romance is in the air; dissipated life

風華絕代.definition: magnificent style unmatched in his generation (idiom); peerless talent

風行.definition: to become fashionable; to catch on; to be popular

風行一時.definition: to be popular for a while; to be all the rage for a time

風衣.definition: windbreaker; wind cheater; wind jacket; CL:件[jian4]

風調.definition: character (of a person, verse, object etc); style

風調雨順.definition: (idiom) to have good weather for crops

風起潮湧.definition: lit. wind rises, tide bubbles up; turbulent times; violent development (idiom)

風起雲湧.definition: to surge like a gathering storm (idiom); to grow by leaps and bounds

風雨.definition: wind and rain; the elements; (fig.) trials and hardships

風雨同舟.definition: lit. in the same boat under wind and rain (idiom); fig. to stick together in hard times

風雨如晦.definition: lit. wind and rain darken the sky (idiom); fig. the situation looks grim

風雨欲來.definition: lit. storm clouds approach; troubles lie ahead (idiom)

風雨漂搖.definition: tossed about by the wind and rain (idiom); (of a situation) unstable

風雨無阻.definition: regardless of weather conditions; rain, hail or shine

風雨飄搖.definition: tossed about by the wind and rain (idiom); (of a situation) unstable

風雲人物.definition: the man (or woman) of the moment (idiom); influential figure

風霜雨雪.definition: lit. wind, frost, rain and snow (idiom); fig. all kinds of trials and hardships

風靡一時.definition: fashionable for a while (idiom); all the rage

風頭.definition: wind direction; the way the wind blows; fig. trend; direction of events; how things develop (esp. how they affect oneself); public opinion (concerning one's actions); publicity (usually derog.); limelight

風風雨雨.definition: trials and tribulations; ups and downs

風餐露宿.definition: lit. to eat in the open air and sleep outdoors (idiom); fig. to rough it

風馬牛不相及.pinyin: feng1 ma3 niu2 bu4 xiang1 ji2
風馬牛不相及.definition: to be completely unrelated to one another (idiom); irrelevant

風骨.definition: strength of character; vigorous style (of calligraphy)
